      Subclasses of RelevancyFeatureDef in com.attivio.sdk.search.relevancy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CategoryBoostFeature
      Dynamic feature that acts as a template for per-category features based on a FieldExpression.
      class  FieldBoostFeature
      FieldExpression based relevancy feature.
      class  PhraseBoostFeature
      Relevancy feature that extracts phrase queries from the user query.
      class  QueryBoostFeature
      Abstract relevancy feature for boosting based on terms extracted from the user query.
      class  TermBoostFeature
      Relevancy feature that extracts term queries from the user query.
